alert.note: Alert for East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 30 at 1:55PM MST until December 30 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 45 to 60 MPH with frequent gusts up to 85 MPH likely. Wind gusts may approach 95 to 100 MPH at times. * WHERE...Platte County including Glendo, Wheatland, and Bordeaux. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. The strongest winds will occur late this afternoon before gradually diminishing. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Extreme winds of this magnitude can lead to property damage.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
